English: Two days later
column8: comrade Shaposhnikov and comrade Lemontov. Let me congratulate you both on your successful offensive.\nI've heard it was a crushing victory."

English: We've won the battle but the war is far from over. Why did you call us here, Zubarev?
There is someone who wanted to talk to you... personally...
Comrade Vladimir Volkov... Welcome to Kolguyev!
At ease, comrades. I come from the mainland. I've heard quite disturbing news of our performace in this archipelago...
Everon fiasco.. and now half of Kolguyev is in enemy hands... Sovet soil, comrades! We are losing Soviet soil here.

I don't want to hear excuses. The enemy is much stronger than anticipated so I arranged for reinforcements to support your war effort.\nThey'll be here in a few days. I want NATO out of this island by the end of december!
Yes, comrade Volkov. We've already begun with that.\nJust yesterday we undertook a major offensive and took back one of the coastal bases.\nThe enemy suffered heavy losses!
I know, comrade Zubarev. I have heard as much. although you failed to mention it was comrade Lemontov leading the offensive.
Well, yes... we all work together here on a master strategy...
Stop bullshitting me, comrade.\nYou are a good politician but as an officer you suck ass. But that's why we have comrades such as Shaposhnikov and Lemontov.
Comrade, I...
We'll talk of this later, don't worry. I have an urgent meeting in Berlin and will have to leave you early.\nI need this matter to be resolved as quickly and efficiently as possible.
That's why comrade Lemontov will from now on be the commander-in-chief of Kolguyev forces.\nYour mission is simple: kick the enemy out of here.\nThink you can do that, comrade?
You can count on me, comrade Volkov.
Excellent, Now, comrade Zubarev, let's discuss our matters. You comrades can return to your duties. Dismissed.
He gave you the command? I can't say I was expecting that!
Me neither. Expected a lot of other things, but Zubarev was his favorite animal around here.\nThis is an interesting development.
What are you going to do now then, commander-in-chief?
I have to defeat NATO forces of course. And I'm gonna have to plan for the future...
Hi comrade, I am expected by comrade Lemontov.
Right this way.
Is that Rashiv?
Of course it is. Come.
Comrade, you wanted to see me?

Yes. I'm gonna make this quick and simple. From now on everyone should adress you as lieutenant.\nYou'll get a new tent at HQ close to mine,\na new uniform and your own squad. Mission orders will come soon. Any questions?
Eh... Just one. Why me?

I think we experienced a lot together for you to even ask, but I'll answer anyway.\nYour father was a good man, a brave and smart soldier and you inherited his best traits and added your own.\nI want you in my commanding centre, plain and simple.
Congratulations, Sergei.
That's everything that should be said in public. We'll speak again later more privately. I'm counting on you, Sergei.
Stas, show him the ropes. Sergei, come later for briefing. Dismissed!
LEONID TO BAZA, I'M ABOUT TO HEAD OUT AND GATHER MY UNIT. AFTERWARDS WE MOVE TO THE DEFENSIVE POSITIONS IN THE SOUTH-EAST. OVER.
BAZA TO LEONID, UNDERSTOOD. TRY TO BE QUICK, THE ENEMY IS EXPECTED TO ATTACK SOON. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, YOU SHOULD KNOW THAT THE AT SQUAD JUST ARRIVED AT THE HELIPORT. THE'RE WAITING FOR YOU TO PICK THEM UP. BAZA OUT.
OUR AT GUNS ARE AT YOUR SERVICE, COMRADE LIEUTENANT!
READY TO SERVE, COMRADE!
WE HAVE BEEN EXPECTING YOU, COMRADE. LET'S GET TO IT!
LEONID TO BAZA, I GATHERED MY UNIT AND WE'RE MOVING TO THE DEFENCE POSITION IN THE SOUTH-EAST. OUT.
FINALLY LEONID, YOU'RE HERE! GET IN ANY POSITION YOU WANT, THERE'S NOT MANY OF US. ENEMY ATTACK IS EXPTECTED ANY MINUTE, GET READY!
BAZA TO LEONID, ENEMY ASSAULT WAS REPELLED. GOOD JOB. BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO LEONID, BAD NEWS. THE ENEMY ASSAULT IS UNDERWAY. TRY TO GET TO OUR POSITIONS AS FAST AS POSSIBLE, OTHERWISE THEY ARE GONNA FALL! BAZA OUT.

BAZA TO LEONID, OUR POSITIONS WERE OVERRUN. WHERE HAVE YOU BEEN, LEONID? THIS IS A FAILURE OF MASSIVE PROPORTIONS. YOU ARE HEREBY DENOTED AND WILL SPEND REST OF WINTER CLEARING THE LATRINES. BAZA OUT.

DEFEND OUR POSITIONS
